p: In order to take advantage of the therapeutic activity of both synthetic and natural substances, an effective way to deliver them to the target cells of the disease should be found. EOs and their ingredients may have irritating properties and may be inactivated in contact with body enzymes. One way to protect the EO ingredients from inactivation after per os administration may be the usage of innovative lipid, glycerol, or glycol nanocapsules [ 78].
